local_intent: Verify t_block visibility; if not visible, scan and then detect to refine pose.
assumptions: Camera and robot are calibrated; t_block may be temporarily out of view.
coherence_with_global: Implements the initial perception-and-recovery branch of the GLOBAL_BT (visibility check with retrying scan) followed by DetectObject, consistent with the verify phase of ensuring the target is visible before further actions.
